ResearchProjectDef.label: starflight basics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Construct the structural and supportive elements of a starship. This is the first step in building a ship to leave this star system.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText:
Escaping from this planet - it would be freedom at last, and maybe a return home.

But before you can even consider interstellar spaceflight, you'll need to reach orbit. The minimum requirements for a spaceworthy craft are a rocket engine, a ship bridge and basic sensors. To survive in space, your colonists will also need either a life-support system or EVA suits.

The amount of chemfuel required to launch a ship into orbit depends on its size. Larger ships may need multiple engines.
